attributes.action: Change the currency in Jamaica to Twenty Jamaican Dollars to One British Pound
attributes.additional_details: I believe as the King is Head of State and the highest ranking official, the Government who inturn works along side the King has the impetus to be able to implement change, the parliament can bring such urgent matters to the King's attention as Jamaica is suffering a crisis, the steadfast movement from parliament will be necessary and only parliament can address the King in such manner
attributes.background: To petition to King Charles and Honourable Andrew Holiness to change the value of the JMD for the betterment of the Jamaican economy and the Jamaican people. To ensure this change has a immediate effect as has no red tape or clauses per say

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The UK Government is not responsible for matters relating to the currency of another country.
